author: markt
msg: Fix XSS issues in snoop.jsp. This is CVE-2007-2449. Some of these are harder (impossible?) to exploit than others but doing all of them means there won't be another XSS issue to patch later.
I also made a similar change for a couple of other JSPs that are in the harder/impossible? to exploit category.
